Text: Cant you post this in .avi or .mp4 format...I watch GH daily but noone is uploading it in the right format for me this week...Hope you can help :) !!!
thank you fore doing this every day. It would be great if you could do it in avi format.

no i use this file format because it is universal all players play .flv file format and if i were to convert it i would loose quality and the quality is pretty good for my file sizes mine are way better than you tube and you tubes are sometimes out of sync
